@ Yiani - disable Parental control   :

1. Go to the Control Panel from the Windows Start menu.
2. Click User Accounts.
3. Click Parental Controls.
4. Click on your account photo.
5. Choose Parental control off

Those having issues with mouse acceleration kindly
open the nvidia control panel and change the max prerendered  frames settings to 0

razorwindmo46: then set to lowest settings which is 1. first of all, open the nvidia control panel, and then click on manage 3d settings. therefore, you can see the tab of program settings. From here, you 
need to add the 007 game executable file. after that, you need have a look from specify settings programs. so, kindly change the prerendered frame to the lowest settings.
